p: To construct plasmid pHHGFP, a PCR fragment containing the gene for enhanced GFP flanked by the conserved sequences of the NS segment was amplified by using as primers 5′ TCAATCA CGTCTCTTATT AGTAGAAACAAGGGTGTTTT 3′ and 5′ CAGTATCA CGTCTCTGGG AGCAAAAGCAGGGTGACAAAG 3′, which contain the NS-specific sequences (underlined) and BsmBI restriction sites (italics). The PCR fragment was digested with BsmBI and ligated with BsmBI-digested plasmid pHH21 ( 87).
